conversations.description: User uploads a raw product launch briefing; PressMate extracts details and generates a first draft.
PR manager provides a URL to the company style guide; the system fetches and applies branding rules.
User requests SEO keywords for a new AI‑powered analytics platform targeting the US market.
After draft creation, the user runs a proofread step to catch tone inconsistencies and grammar errors.
PressMate formats the proofread release into HTML for direct upload to the corporate newsroom.
User asks for a CSV media list for the fintech industry in Europe, limited to 200 contacts.
Schedule the finalized press release to go live on PRNewswire at 09:00 GMT tomorrow.
User supplies a multilingual briefing; the system extracts event details in both English and Spanish.
Generate SEO keywords for a sustainability report aimed at ESG investors in Asia.
Create a press release for a charity gala, enforcing a formal tone from the brand guide.
User wants a markdown version of the release for internal Slack distribution.
Produce a headline‑only preview to get executive approval before full drafting.
User uploads a brief with missing dates; PressMate prompts for clarification and fills gaps.
Generate a list of industry‑specific journalists for a health‑tech product launch.
User asks to embed top SEO keywords naturally into the quote section of the release.
Proofread step highlights excessive jargon; the system suggests simpler alternatives.
Schedule a series of three releases for a product rollout across North America, Europe, and APAC.
User provides a competitor’s press release; PressMate analyses tone and suggests differentiation.
Create an emergency press release template for a data breach, adhering to legal compliance rules.
User requests a plain‑text version for email distribution, with line‑length limits.
Generate a media list filtered by outlet type (blogs, podcasts, magazines) for a SaaS launch.
User supplies a short tagline; the system expands it into a compelling lead paragraph.
Run a readability score check and get suggestions to achieve a 7th‑grade reading level.
User asks to include localized SEO keywords for French‑Canadian market in a tech announcement.
Create a press release for a partnership announcement, pulling brand colors from the style guide.
User wants to see a side‑by‑side diff of the original draft vs. the proofread version.
Generate a QR code link to the online release and embed it in the HTML footer.
User provides a brief with multiple event dates; PressMate drafts separate releases for each.
Fetch a legacy style guide from a protected file share and apply its legacy headline capitalization.
User asks for a summary of the release in 140 characters for Twitter promotion.
Create an embargo notice section automatically based on user‑selected embargo date.
User wants to insert a product image URL and have Alt‑text generated for SEO.
Produce a “boiler‑plate” company description block from the corporate style guide.
User requests a version of the release optimized for LinkedIn’s article format.
Generate a CSV of contact emails with personalized subject lines using the release headline.
User asks for a word count report and suggestions to tighten the release under 400 words.
Create an internal stakeholder approval workflow with automatic notifications after each step.
User provides a brief with a video script; PressMate extracts key quotes for the release.
Generate a press release for a quarterly earnings call, automatically inserting financial metrics.
User wants to test different headline variants using A/B testing suggestions from the system.
Produce a press release in two languages side‑by‑side for a global product launch.
User asks for a list of high‑authority backlinks to include as references in the release.
Create a press release for a corporate social responsibility initiative, adhering to brand tone.
User wants to add a “Call to Action” button link and have the system suggest optimal phrasing.
Generate a media outreach email template that references the newly formatted press release.
User uploads an old release; PressMate updates it with current SEO keywords and new brand guidelines.
Create a press release for a new office opening, automatically pulling location data from the brief.
User requests a quick “one‑pager” summary for senior leadership, derived from the full release.
Generate a list of suggested hashtags based on SEO keywords for social media amplification.
User asks for a compliance check to ensure no forward‑looking statements violate SEC regulations.
Create a press release for a product recall, following a predefined crisis communication template.
User requests a visual timeline infographic data extracted from the release content.
Generate a version of the release with embedded structured data markup (JSON‑LD) for SEO.
User asks to schedule the release for prime time based on target audience timezone analysis.
